entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, North Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:00 p.m. EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -1.4Â°C

Observed at: North Bay Airport 3:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of ice pellets mixed with freezing rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of ice pellets mixed with freezing rain beginning after midnight then changing to freezing rain mixed with rain before morning. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Freezing rain or rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or rain. High plus 4. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Low zero. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
